rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with Vastu-aligned design, featuring a small foyer and reception area.
Large living room with Art Deco design elements, natural light from windows on east and west sides.
Elegant dining room adjoining the living room, designed for social gatherings.
Modern kitchen with Vastu-aligned placement to the south-east corner of the cottage.
Spacious master bedroom with dedicated dressing area and en-suite bathroom; positioned according to Vastu for a peaceful environment.
Guest bedroom with en-suite bathroom; designed to maintain privacy and comfort.
Second guest bedroom with en-suite bathroom, ensuring ample space for visitors.
Dedicated home office designed with Art Deco motifs and optimized for productivity, located in a quiet corner.
Private gym with Vastu-compliant positioning for energy flow and wellness, featuring modern fitness equipment.
Central bathroom facility designed with Vastu principles for harmonious energy distribution.

openings.description: North-facing main entrance with a foyer that leads to the living area.
Large windows in the living room for natural light and cross ventilation.
Strategically placed kitchen windows to aid in ventilation and adherence to Vastu.
